name: Charcoal Pencils
description:
Use the directional arrows to move. If the game is unresponsive at first, click on the title screen.

Made in two weeks for the Field Guide september Bitsy Jam.

Writing, music, graphics and programming: Léo Mirland.

You can listen to the game's soundtrack here.

Title screen font: Le Murmure by Jérémy Landes & Velvetyne Type Foundry.

Ambience sounds: Alexander Weidner.
